name: Babka On The Hunt Classic
description:
Grandma is updated! Meet: a new implementation of the old game. A big surprise has been prepared for you, among the researchers. Start a new journey for your beloved grandmother.

The main character of the game: grandmother Dusya. He loves hunting and gathering. Try to please her: collect things, develop in the game, buy skins.

The game has taken on a new look. And it differs from the old version with global improvements in visuals, design and implementation. See the Creagoo website for an overview of the changes to the game and what progress has been made.

Grandmother's journey will take place in a variety of locations: from Pavlovsky Posad to space battles. You won't get bored with Grandma!

Choose the mode you are interested in: Old game, arcade, arena and much more. Watch in game and complete it 100%

And to save your every step - use Creagoo Account. Thanks to this technology, you can save progress inside Creagoo games, see additional. information: https://live.creagoo.ru/account
